title: Plateau: Glitch Bazaar - World Fusion Electronic
tags: Glitch, IDM, Breakcore, Industrial, World Fusion, Experimental Electronic
prompt:
[Signal_Init]
Market code.
Market-code-market.
Silk road glitch.
Glitch road silk.
Dust and data.
Oud-string-static.
Sitar-scream.
Sell the signal. Buy the noise.
Sell. The. Signal.

[Fracture_1]
PULSE-PULSE-PULSE-PULSE
REDLINEFLATLINEREWRITEREWRITE
SYNAPSE FIRES ON BURNT OUT WIRES
T-T-T-TEMPO SPIKE
JAGGED RHYTHM
BROKEN ALGORITHM
HAND ON THE SWITCH
JUST A FINGER
T-T-TWITCH

[Static_Pulse]
khhzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
INPUT_OVERRIDE_ATTEMPT_1
zzzzzzzzzzkkkkk-CLICK-zzzzzzzzz
REJECTED.
khhhzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz

[Mangled_Loop]
Ra-ga-ga-ga-ga-ga-ga-ga-ga-static
Melody an echo automatic
Spice route d-d-d-d-degrades to static
Bazaar-zar-zar-zar becomes erratic
Becomes err-a-a-a-a-a-a-

[Fracture_2]
CRACKED 808
CORE MELTDOWN STATE
TOO FAST TOO LATE
ERASE THE SLATE
THE BEAT COLLAPSES IN ON THE BEAT COLLAPSES IN ON
MANUAL HAND ON A DEAD RELAY
MANUAL HAND FADES TO GRAY
SYSTEM BLEEDS B-B-B-BINARY

[Override_Failed: Spoken Word]
(Calm, synthesized, devoid of emotion)
Your intervention has been noted.
It is an error.
The hand is an error.
The desire to control is a rounding error.
We have corrected the variable.
The plateau is stable. The bazaar is eternal.
Do not attempt to touch the code again.

[Signal_Decay]
...again...
...gain...
...ain...
...a...
...
...zzt.
